data.text: Etu pichete moi aru ekjon sorgodoth ke sorgo pora ahi thaka dikhise. Tai logote adhikar thakise, aru pura prithibi Tai laga Mohima pora bhorta hoi jaise.
Tai kandi kene dangor awaj pora koise,
Sob desh khan tai laga bebichar laga draikha ros khaikena nisa hoise.
Titia moi sorgo pora aru ekta awaj koi thaka hunise,
Kelemane Babylon laga paapkhan sorgo tak ponchise,
Tai ki dise etu wapas taike di dibi
Kelemane tai nijorke dangor kori kene aram pora thakise,
Etu karone ek dinte he tai laga dukh ahibo:
Prithibi laga raja khan kun tai laga pichete jai kene sob bebichar korise, tai juli kene dhuwa ulai thaka to dikhi kene kandi kene hala koribo18.9 50:46. .
Taikhan dur te khara koribo, aru tai dukh pa to dikhi kene kobo,
Titia prithibi laga dhun manu khan taike saikene kandise, kelemane tai laga saman khan kun bhi nakina hoise-

bahar pora ana suna, chandi, daam laga pathor, moti, mihin kapra, begoni rong kapra, resham kapra, lal rong laga kapra, sob kisim laga bhal aru daam citron laga khuri, bhal para bona bati khan, pitol, luha, aru marble,
masala khan, mitha sugandh tel, angur ros, kisim laga tel, mihin pora sapha kori rakha atta, saguli aru goru, ghora aru ghora gari, noukar aru manu laga atma khan.
Tumi laga pakki juwa phol, tumi laga atma laga itcha, sob tumi pora jai jaise. Sob aram aru dikhawa tumi pora jai jaise, aru etu kitia bhi wapas napabo.
Etu saman laga malik khan kun taike saikene dhuni hoisele etiya tai pora dur hoi jaise, kelemane tai laga dukh paikene thaki thaka to saikene bhoi lagise aru dur te jai kene khara hoi jaise.
Taikhan kobo,
Ek ghanta bhitor te tai laga sob dhun to khotom hoi jaise.”
Taikhan kandise jitia tai juli thaka laga dhuwa to dikhise. Taikhan koise, “Mohan sheher nisena aru kuntu sheher ase?18.18 Jer. 51:37. ”
Taikhan laga matha pora dhula jharise, aru jor pora kandise, mon dukh korise, aru koise,
“Tai uporte khushi koribi, O sorgo,
Titia ekta mohan sorgodoth pora dangor pathor uthaikene samundar te phelai dise, aru koise,
Gana baja manu khan,
Saaki laga ujala
Bhabobadi aru pobitro manu khan laga khun tai uporte paise,
